mapper.insert: insert into location( locname, name_desc, latitude,longitude, post, address, filename, filepath, filenamed, filepathd, filenamet, filepatht) values (#{locname}, #{name_desc}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{post}, #{address}, #{filename}, #{filepath}, #{filenamed}, #{filepathd}, #{filenamet}, #{filepatht})
mapper.select: select * from location order by locname
select * from location where type='1' and loccode= #{loccode} order by locname
